patthana7.5:1.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana7.5:2.1: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana7.5:3.1: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana7.5:4.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
